description:
Interact with the Encointer Blockchain The Encointer wallet is your tool to participate in local communitiy currencies, to perform Encointer key-signing ceremonies and receive your universal basic income. The wallet keeps custody of your accounts' private keys and allows you to transfer funds to other users.
  • send and receive encointer local currencies
  • register for ceremonies
  • perform ceremony meetups
Please try our tutorials: Encointer Book
